name: Dying: Reborn VR
summary: In DYING: Reborn PS VR the player becomes an investigator who, using state-of-the-art VR technology, gets to unravel and investigate the case of Mathew's lost sister as well as a series of eerie events following it. By immersing oneself in the world of D:R, the player will explore a series of fragments that together form 3 chapters of Mathew's story. Those hungry for the complete 6 chapter story can check out the PS4 version of D:R.
